tier.item: (13) Adjunct Verb Sub ject Ob ject
Gestern sah die Frau den Mann
Yesterday saw the woman the man

Gestern sah die Frau den Mann

Den Mann sah die Frau gestern
the man saw the woman yesterday

Thorsten has that/wants to have that
